destination.description: Explore the ancient wonders of Rome, including the Colosseum, Vatican City, and the Roman Forum. Experience the rich history and delicious Italian cuisine.
highlights: Visit to Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Rome
itinerary.description: Transfer to hotel and welcome dinner

itinerary.title: Ancient Rome Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill

destination.description: Discover the iconic landmarks of London, from Buckingham Palace to the Tower of London. Enjoy traditional afternoon tea and West End shows.
The ultimate European adventure covering 8 countries. Experience diverse cultures, cuisines, and landscapes across the continent.
